page.title: 14My house (2)/Our Houses
page.content:
I live in a council house. It is terraced. We have a garden and some grass. We have a toilet and bathroom downstairs. We have four bedrooms and we have 14 stairs. We have a larder and a coalhouse. Altogether we have 10 rooms. We have a back yard and we have a shed. ------------------------------------- {A graph of the houses for our class.}
|=====|=====|=====| Council | 0 | 1 | 8 | |=====|=====|=====| Owner occupied | 10 | 6 | 5 | |=====|=====|=====| (Private) rented| 0 | 0 | 0 | |=====|=====|=====| Deta-|Semi-|Terr- ched |deta-|aced |ched |
